fields.name: Clean Up Kit (Adult)
fields.description: Our Adult size Clean Up kit contains an adult size high visibility vest embellished with the KCC Logo, an adult’s size litter picker, a roll of heavy-duty rubbish bags
fields.information: As we buy our kits in bulk, we are able to pass on the savings to you. The price includes a small donation to the KCC to help us with the purchase of additional materials and pay for the running costs of the group

fields.name: Clean Up Kit (Child)
fields.description: Our Child size Clean Up kit contains a child size high visibility vest embellished with the KCC Logo, an child’s size litter picker, a roll of heavy-duty rubbish bags
fields.information: As we buy our kits in bulk, we are able to pass on the savings to you. The price includes a small donation to the KCC to help us with the purchase of additional materials and pay for the running costs of the group

fields.name: Wildflower Meadow
fields.description: Our wildflower mix contains 1000s of seeds from Irish wildflower species. Each pack comes with clay and top soil premixed, providing coverage for approx. 2m2
fields.information: As we buy our seeds and clay in bulk, we are able to pass on the savings to you. The price includes a small donation to the KCC to help us with the purchase of additional materials and pay for the running costs of the group

fields.name: Gift a Tree
fields.description: The prefect gift. A native Irish tree will be planted in your name
fields.information: In return for your donation, you will receive a certificate containing the species, information and location of your tree

fields.name: Water Bottle
fields.description: Dishwasher safe, 100% recycled plastic, eco-friendly and embellished with the KCC logo
fields.information: A small portion of the cost includes a donation to the KCC to help us with the purchase of additional materials and pay for the running costs of the group
